Articles.Content:
Is there any plugin out there that changes the in game spline curve for solar panels into a realistic 1/d2 equation?

Edited November 3, 2013 by Azivegu
Thought it was 1/d^2. And yes, I'm doing that for real solar system.
don't quote me on this, but I think InterStellar Mod does

You are correct, it is indeed 1/d2. I will fix that immediately. And if you are going to do that, would you be willing to make it as a separate plugin? I love the real solar system mod, but for my everyday gameplay I would rather keep the vanilla size.

And I went to check it out and in the update list there is something that mentions what I am requesting in the Interstellar Mod, but I haven't found any follow up info for it nor have I noticed anything while playing with it. But I have only been using for a mere days so further testing is needed. I'll probably email the maker of interstellar.
